__e: The question is what are you willing to do for me?
or is willing to do more to ensure everything is done exactly how you want it.
I don't know. Perhaps because I want you to realise that I love you. Because I'm ready to do anything for you.
How much are you willing to pay for that?
The Reliable Oil Company is prepared to pay the sum of $50,000 to you... to keep your product off the market.
A beautiful woman from nowhere ready to pay gold for passage to anywhere? It doesn"t make sense.
Just because I have to leave early one year, you're willing to throw away a lifetime of weekends?
I don't know. Perhaps because I want you to realise that I love you. Because I'm ready to do anything for you.
Because I'd do anything rather than live with you... anything, rather than take more of what you've given... anything!
She was hard-working, loyal, honest... And eager to invest her money... Where it would do the most good.
I'm sorry I lost my temper and said those rude things, and I'm willing to go and tell Mrs. Lynde so.

I wonder if you're willing to compensate me for it.
All you got to be is willing to take it to the max.
Are you ever in the mood for anything?
